attributes.action: The UK Government must submit Article 50 to leave the EU immediately.
attributes.additional_details: We do not need a new prime minister to submit an Article 50 application. There is no valid reason to delay.
attributes.background: The voting is over and the decision is clear. It is therefore unsatisfactory that the British Public must wait at least 3 months for the UK government to submit an Article 50 application to leave the EU. The government wishes to avoid political and financial instabilty. Delay creates instability.
